item.title: Plz help me : donater items iquip
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“bbl111, post:2, topic:278368”]Declare donator in client.java and then do something like this in wearing.java I believe.

public int donator { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); //your items here with return 1 at the end return 1; } }[/quote]

i h8 ur sig

i was kidding about that to… and it was epeon anyway so it was somethign diff lol

item.title: Plz help me : donater items iquip
item.dc:creator: @bbl111 bbl111
item.description:
@bbl111 wrote:

Declare donator in client.java and then do something like this in wearing.java I believe.

public int donator { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); //your items here with return 1 at the end return 1; } }
